name: Freefall Tournament
description: A space marines team-based TPS (third person shooter).
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i3 Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: minimal requirements DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: required
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia 7xx or Radeon equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: required
